title: I found this awesome mod.

replies.body:
If it's just visual effects and doesn't give you any significant or physical advantages via combat or interface, then it's fine.

A mod that changes how animations look is fine.
replies.body_tagged:
If it's just visual effects and doesn't give you any significant or physical advantages via combat or interface, then it's fine.

A mod that changes how animations look is fine.

replies.body: I'm sure this is allowed, seeing as Refraction himself hasn't gotten banned from hypixel, and they allow less mods than avicus.
replies.body_tagged: I'm sure this is allowed, seeing as Refraction himself hasn't gotten banned from hypixel, and they allow less mods than avicus.

replies.body: Yeah, Basically it fulfills the functions that the LabyMod have, since it is very similar I do not think that they precenten disadvantages when using it and I believe that it is allowed.
